column4: Social;Preah Vihear: On the------ afternoon of September 26
column6: 3 people were injured and a farm vehicle  destroyed after an explosion from a landmine. The blast happened in an area close to Sen Teak village: Morakot commune
column14: 30 were transported to a rescue at 16 January Referral Hospital in Preah Vihear province.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/262399------ ------ ------ ------
